# HoAh Dictation v3.5.8
### Enhancements * **AI Action Reorder**: Updated the default order of AI Actions to: Basic, Polish, Q&A, Translate. This prioritizes the most commonly used actions. * **UI Fixes**: - Fixed an issue where the App Icon was displayed at a smaller size on macOS versions prior to Sequoia. - Improved the visual consistency of the "AI Action" checkbox in the enhancement menu by ensuring it uses the correct toggle style.

### Fixes * **Recording Stability**: Fixed a potential crash when exporting audio to WAV. * **Device Change Handling**: Made audio device change notifications safe to avoid dangling callbacks.

### Improvements * **Onboarding Refresh**: Clearer onboarding copy with updated localizations for a smoother first-run experience. * **Update Check Gating**: The ‚ÄúCheck for Updates‚Äù button now appears only on non‚ÄìMac App Store builds. * **Developer ID Sparkle**: Updated entitlements and Sparkle setup for Developer ID signing.

### Enhancements * **Icon Refresh**: Updated App Icon and Menu Bar Icon to strictly follow macOS Big Sur+ design guidelines for better size consistency and visual alignment. * **Vintage Visualizer**: Increased sensitivity for the Vintage theme ink visuals, making them more responsive and lively.

# HoAh Dictation v3.5.3
### New Visualizers * **Cyberpunk Waveform**: Experience audio visualization like never before with a liquid, high-resolution continuous waveform that pulsates with your voice. * **Vintage Ink Dots**: A minimal, calming visualizer style featuring rounded, sparse ink dots.
### Improvements * **Theme System**: Complete refactor of the Mini Recorder's visualization engine to be fully theme-driven, allowing for distinct shapes, sizes, and behaviors per theme. * **Deterministic Visuals**: Visualizer randomness is now seeded for consistent aesthetic behavior across sessions.
---

What's New in Version 3.4.6

  • UI Enhancements: Redesigned the Transcription History filter and search bar for a cleaner, more modern look.
  • Export Filtered: The "Export" button now explicitly states "Export Filtered" to clarify that it exports results based on current filters.
  • Localization: Added Chinese translations for duration filters and export options.

What's New in Version 3.4.5

  • New User Guide: Completely revamped the Help section with a concise User Guide and API Setup Guide.
  • Improved Settings: Reorganized the Settings window, adding dedicated "Check for Updates" and "Troubleshooting" sections.

What's New in Version 3.4.4

  • Error Feedback: Enhanced error reporting for AI configurations. Now shows specific errors in the menu bar and settings status.
  • Stability: Fixed validation state handling to prevent incorrect error displays.

What's New in Version 3.4.3

  • UI Improvements: Removed the help link for API Keys and disabled auto-fill for configuration names.
  • Bug fixes and stability improvements.

What's New in Version 3.4.2

  • UX Improvements: Creating or editing AI configurations no longer overwrites your custom name when switching providers.
  • AWS Bedrock: Fixed an issue where discontinued models (e.g., Nova) could appear in the selection list.
  • Performance: Optimized AWS profile loading to be faster and more efficient.

What's New in Version 3.4.1

  • Bug fixes and stability improvements.

What's New in Version 3.4.0

  • AI Prompts: Deprecated System Instructions and refined prompt templates for better performance.
  • UI Enhancements: Refined Homepage Demo Cards and Logo Display.
  • Bug Fixes: Removed placeholder logic for name input and general improvements.

What's New in Version 3.3.9

  • Bug fixes and stability improvements.

What's New in Version 3.3.8

  • Onboarding Redesign: Streamlined permissions flow with cleaner card-based UI.
  • Code Cleanup: Removed duplicate localization keys and improved code quality.
